Klasse WorldUtils

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.WorldUtils
public final class WorldUtils extends Object
Utilities related to worlds.

    • spawnBlockStructure

      public static List<org.bukkit.entity.BlockDisplay> spawnBlockStructure(org.bukkit.World world, BlockStructure structure, org.bukkit.Location location, List<String> scoreboardTags)
      Creates a structure of block displays for the specified BlockStructure object at the specified location and spawns them in the specified World.
      Parameter:
      world - the world the entities should be spawned in
      structure - the block structure that should be spawned
      location - the location where the structure should be spawned
      scoreboardTags - list of scoreboard tags that should be added
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of the spawned block displays
